Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway/Franchot Tunnel Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northeast corner of Castle Rutger. Franchot Tunnel intersects the main circular hallway at this point.
Room.LongDescription: Franchot Tunnel will take you to the center courtyard. It heads in a southwest direction, and goes past the chambers of Franchot the paladin, commander of the Black Guard which is an elite force pledged to Prince Rutger. The Black Guard believes that only Rutger has the rightful succession to the Lyanden throne.
